Posts.Content: Soyaandpepper wrote: Hi ladies, I just had BMX with 1 step to implants 3 weeks ago and I have a tooth that needs extraction, I will put this off as long as possible during my healing process for at least 6 months if I can. I'm doing some research and I found that you need antibiotics for this. Anyone who had it done like that? My research  show a link to CC and dental work and some resulted in the removal of the implants due to infection. Maybe you ladies can share some light into this!  Dx 4/13/2012, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 5/7/2012 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Antibiotics for teeth extraction after BMX with implants Soyaandpepper Blessings2011

Posts.Content: Soyaandpepper wrote: Hey ladies,  I'm 3 weeks post BMX with SNB on the right side and was wondering how long I should wait to shave under my arms? My doc say still not to shave yet since I might cut myself and cause an infection. I have an incision about 2 inches long under my arms and its has healed about 90%, but my under hair is really getting long and just wondering when you ladies started to shave under your arms again. Thanks!  Dx 4/13/2012, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 5/7/2012 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long to wait to shave underarms after a mastectomy and SNB? Soyaandpepper MFalabella
